songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Niggas wanna hang, yeah (hang, nigga)
Cause they cannot be the mans, yeah
Chase like I'm the man, yeah (the man, nigga)
They all went 'Golden' like the rent, yeah (Golden!)
Go give a fuck about the two cents (go fuck, nigga)
Or the money that I do spend (money!)
Virginia Black with the ice, that's the new blend (VG, VG)
Like I'm bout to start a new trend

[Pre-Hook]
Ah man, ah man (yeah)
Put the work by the fan (woo)
Keep the hammer in my hand (blah, blah)
Ah man, ah man (woo)
I got different plans
Used to pull up with the pipes (pull up, pull up)
Now I pull up with the bands (woo)

[Hook]
Because I am who I am, yeah (yah, yah, yah)
Because I am who I am, yeah (yah, yah, yah)
I got bitches on my 'Gram, now (got bitches!)
Because I am who I am, now (yah, yah, yah, yah)
I'm the man, I'm the man
I'm the man, I'm the man (the man, nigga)
So they all want to pretend now (pretend, nigga)
Because I am who I am, yeah (yah, yah, yah)

[Verse 2]
Got a night pack on back
And a Mac on my back
Left him dead
Got em wacked
Hollow tips on the strap (pow, pow)
Man-man talking to the feds (no)
So we know you niggas rats
And we’ll stack up the racks
Double up on the packs (blah, blow)

[Bridge]
They don't wanna see me "Pop Style"
They gon' see me come and drop down
And she don't wanna see me pop now (she wet, she wet, yeah)
They don't wanna see me pop (she wet)

[Pre-Hook]
Ah man, ah man
Put the work by the fan
Keep the hammer in my hand
Ah man, ah man
I got different plans (woo)
Used to pull up with the pipes (pull up, pull up)
Now I pull up with the bands

[Hook]
Because I am who I am, yeah (yah, yah, yah)
Because I am who I am, yeah (yah, yah, yah)
I got bitches on my 'Gram, now (got bitches!)
Because I am who I am, now (woo, woo, woo)
I'm the man, I'm the man (I'm the man, nigga)
I'm the man, I'm the man (I'm the man, nigga)
So they all want to pretend now
Because I am who I am, yeah (yah, yah, yah)

[Verse 3]
If you come to my block
That might be your last stop
I got the drop on your stash spot
Take you for your tings and your long talk

[Pre-Hook]
Ah man, ah man
Put the work by the fan
Keep the hammer in my hand
Ah man, ah man
I got different plans
Used to pull up with the pipes
Now I pull up with the bands

[Hook]
Because I am who I am, yeah (yah)
Because I am who I am, yeah (yah, yah, yah)
I got bitches on my 'Gram, now (got bitches!)
Because I am who I am, now (woo, woo, woo)
I'm the man, I'm the man (the man, nigga)
I'm the man, I'm the man (the man)
So they all want to pretend now
Because I am who I am, yeah (yah, yah, yah)
songs.title: I Am Who I Am
